arts.ttl: On Fire in Chicago: Hugo Cuypers lighting things up in the MLS
arts.sum: Last January, Hugo Cuypers swapped the Belgian Pro League for the MLS. The striker left Gent after two fantastic seasons, with the first seeing him score 34 goals in 56â€¦

arts.ttl: 3 Must-Watch MLS Games This Weekend: LA Galaxy, Vancouver Whitecaps, Atlanta United
arts.sum: Vancouver Whitecaps FC's Sebastian Berhalter will face his dad, Gregg Berhalter, and the Chicago Fire.
